title: Create a Project Organization Chart
description: An agent must create an organization chart based on a list of project roles and their reporting structure.

tasks.description: Receive a list of roles and who they report to (e.g., 'Analyst A reports to Manager B').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully ingests the hierarchical data.

tasks.description: Generate a visual organization chart (e.g., using Mermaid syntax) that accurately reflects the reporting structure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a valid and correct organizational chart diagram.
